wpt.name: GC3FD46
wpt.desc: Broadrun Treasure by ifen27, Traditional Cache (1.5/2.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Broadrun Treasure
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: this is the first cache I've ever hidden. It has been placed here with the permission of West Bradford township. Easy to get within 100 ft. and then it gets difficult. A not so crisp Washington for FTF.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description: Cache is a Glad screw top Tupperware container. Black duct tape around it for camouflage. Contains small kid friendly trinkets, a 1$ bill for FTF, and a Log with pencil.

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Took some looking in the dark, but we git it! Found with dawnie22 and 19acassel.
